thread.title: Off the Mark on Polymath Ibn Khaldun’s Writings

author: wsjcom
title: Off the Mark on Polymath Ibn Khaldun’s Writings
text:
In Eric Ormsby’s review of Robert Irwin’s new book “Ibn Khaldun: An Intellectual Biography” (Books, March 17), he Quote: s Mr. Irwin’s critique of my earlier work of Ibn Khaldun (“The Orange Trees of Marrakesh: Ibn Khaldun and the Science of Man” Harvard 2015) in which Mr. Irwin writes that I argue that Ibn Khaldun was a philosopher and that it was a mistake to argue he was influenced by Aristotelian ideas. Mr. Irwin misrepresents my book.
Ibn Khaldun was not a philosopher and did not write like one. He never claimed to be...
